description: The Godaichou (五大頂, Five Great Peaks) is a group of six warriors which act as the main armed force of P.A. ODA. They are also called as the Rokutenmagun (六天魔軍, Six-Demon Army), although two of the members are counted as one, thus the "five" in "Five Great Peaks". They are considered to be the private army of Nobunaga Oda himself.
name: Godaichou
